name: Ink Hero
description:
Ink Hero is a 2D platform jumping type game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells the protagonist's ability to constantly improve himself through battle, thus eliminating many of the ancient Chinese legends.

Basic operation of the game
Ordinary attack, skill, jump, climb the wall

Game Features
Need to evade enemy attacks by tumbling or skill, which requires a certain speed of response.

The beautiful Chinese classical art picture puts you in the mountains and waters.

Elegant Chinese classical music, background music is mostly played by Chinese classical instruments such as guzheng, pipa and erhu.
